page.title: 08A Day in Grimsby, Part 2.
page.content: trophies (We do all these things together) and lastly I get the projector out of a cupboard and position it up with a screen. It's Monday today so because I do{assembly, I leave the classroom early to get ready and have a last practice. After {assembly}we have{English,}the last part of the lesson is sometimes quite hard and I have to use an{encyclopedia ({English}lasts from 9.20 to 10.40) After this it is break. My friends and I like to play{rounders}and a game where everyone gets in pairs, in a long line, and someone jumps on and they throw them up and down. At 10.55 till 12.00 we have{Maths.}I work in a group of three.Sometimes in{Maths}I go on the{computer}and play a procedure called{Logo.}Dinner time is from 12.00 to 1.15. We play all our best games.
